Description: At top 40 guitarsour customers satisfaction is our first concern.All of out items have a 14 day return policy.If after 14 days you are not completely satisfiedwith your purchase, please return it for a full refund....Peace be with you... *all returned items must be in the same condition theywere at the time of sale. All original packing must be included. #Up for Sale is a 2018 Jackson PDX-2 Signature Model Demmelition King V Electric Guitar! Gloss Black w / Silver Bevels Finish! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Jackson PDX-2 Signature Model Demmelition King V Shredder guitar. This is a Phil Demmel of Machine Head Signature guitar. A "Go Fast" King V with Emg's and Floyd Rose® Special Double Locking 2-Point Tremolo. From The Web: The regal Jackson PDX-2 Demmelition King V Electric Guitar is the X-Series version of the award-winning Demmelition King V”the critically acclaimed signature model of Machine Head guitarist Phil Demmel. The guitar's classic sharp V-shaped alder body has a more aggressive edge thanks to additional cutouts. Built to Phil Demmel's exact specifications, the X Series Signature Demmelition King V™ PDX-2 features a one-piece through-body maple neck, 12"-16" compound radius bound rosewood fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets and classic Jackson sharkfin inlays, EMG® HZ pickups, dual volume controls and three-way blade pickup selector switch and a Floyd Rose® Special bridge. FeaturesKing V body styleBolt-on maple neck25-1/2" scale12"-16" compound radius fretboard24 jumbo fretsFloyd Rose Special double-locking 2-point tremoloJackson Floyd Rose nut1.69" (43mm) nut widthDual EMG HZ humbucking pickupsPearloid shark fin position inlaysBlack hardwareVolume control (neck pickup)/volume control (bridge pickup)3-position blade switchDie-cast tuners Our luthier did a complete setup. Brand new strings were installed. Gig ready on Arrival! Stand Out From The Crowd! Serial Number: #ICJ1853639 Weight: 7.90 lbs. Case is NOT Included Due to CITES Treaty for Endangered Wood (Mahogany, Rosewood) We no longer ship out of the USA. Cosmetics: Excellent Condition. Pristine. Dripping with "Mojo". It is used. Not perfect. Overall, a really nice guitar. Look at the pictures closely. They will tell the story. Top 40 guitars is a Veteran owned business.
